question.title: What is the typical appearance of hemorrhoidal thrombosis?
question.description: What is the typical appearance of hemorrhoidal thrombosis?

option_c.title: A flat, painless area of skin discoloration
option_c.description: A flat, painless area of skin discoloration

option_d.title: A large, painful swelling with ulceration
option_d.description: A large, painful swelling with ulceration
